DOC.brief_summary: A single dose study to assess the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacokinetics of MK6349 in Type 2 Diabetics.
DOC.brief_title: A Single-Dose Study of MK6349 in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes (6349-002)
DOC.criteria: Subject is a nonsmoking male or female (females must be postmenopausal, had a tubal ligation or a hysterectomy) between 18 to 55 years of age Subject has Type 2 Diabetes and is currently being treated with diet and exercise alone or with less than 3 oral diabetes drugs Subject is on insulin or a PPAR agonist medication Subject has Type 1 diabetes
